title: PARTS
description: Dr Dominic Pimenta is a British cardiology doctor and author, running juniordoctorblog.com and writing for the Independent, Guardian and Huffington Post. His first book, PARTS, brings the hospital frontline to you, combining the science, art and humanity of modern medicine into a moving account of a doctor in today's healthcare system. **10% of your purchase price will be donated to the British Heart Foundation, researching heart disease, stroke and dementia.**
author: Dominic Pimenta
